title: The Lost Key
intro: You find yourself standing at the edge of an ancient forest. A dense mist hangs in the air, and the trees whisper secrets you can't quite understand. Your mission is simple: find the Lost Key, said to unlock a treasure hidden deep within the forest.

leftPath.description: You follow the path and encounter a Ranger sitting by a campfire. He looks up as you approach.

choices.choice: Ignore him and continue on your path

rightPath.description: You push through the vines and arrive at an old stone door partially covered by moss.

choices.choice: Search the area around the door

rangerHelp.description: The Ranger eyes you suspiciously but decides to speak. 'The Lost Key is hidden in the Cave of Shadows. But be warned, there are dangers lurking.' He offers you a Torch.

choices.choice: Thank the Ranger and head to the Cave
Ask about the dangers in the Cave

ignoreRanger.description: You walk deeper into the forest. Suddenly, a wild animal leaps from the bushes!

fightAnimal.description: You bravely face the wild animal and manage to scare it away. You find a clue it was guarding.

choices.choice: Return to the Ranger for more information

runAway.description: You manage to escape the wild animal, but you feel lost and disoriented.

choices.choice: Try to find your way back to the path
Climb a tree to get a better view

stoneDoorOpen.description: The tunnel inside is dark. After walking for some time, you reach a room with a locked chest in the center.

searchAroundDoor.description: You find a rusted key hidden under some moss. It looks like it could fit in the chest back at the stone door.

choices.choice: Go back to the chest and try the key

examineChest.description: You use the Rusted Key to open the chest and find a map that leads to the Cave of Shadows.

choices.choice: Follow the map to the Cave
Return to the forest to explore more

returnForest.description: You return to the forest and find yourself at a crossroads. Which way will you go?

keepExploring.description: You keep exploring and find a hidden cave entrance covered by thick vines.

caveEntrance.description: You arrive at the Cave of Shadows, the entrance dark and foreboding. The Torch illuminates a faint path inside.

askAboutCave.description: The Ranger warns you: 'The Cave of Shadows is filled with traps and dangerous creatures. Proceed with caution.'

choices.choice: Thank the Ranger and head to the Cave

turnBack.description: You decide it's best to return to the forest and reconsider your options.

choices.choice: Explore a different part of the forest

caveInside.description: Inside the cave, you find two paths: one leading deeper into darkness, and the other to a glowing pool of water.

choices.choice: Take the path into the darkness

glowingPool.description: You approach the pool and find a glowing object at the bottom. You dive in to retrieve it and discover it's the Lost Key!

choices.choice: Stay and explore the treasure room

darkPath.description: The darkness grows thick, and you feel a chill running down your spine. Something moves in the shadows.

darkCreature.description: A shadowy figure lunges at you, but you manage to fend it off with the Torch, revealing a hidden passage.

hiddenPassage.description: The hidden passage leads to a secret chamber filled with ancient artifacts and a map.

choices.choice: Use the Secret Map to find the Lost Key
Take the Ancient Artifact and leave the cave

hiddenCave.description: Inside the hidden cave, you discover an altar with a mysterious inscription.

choices.choice: Ignore the altar and explore further

readInscription.description: The inscription reveals a clue about the Lost Key's location.

choices.choice: Ignore the clue and explore further

exploreFurther.description: You venture deeper into the hidden cave and find an underground river flowing quietly.

findPath.description: You manage to find a familiar path and regain your bearings.

climbTree.description: From the top of the tree, you spot the entrance to the Cave of Shadows in the distance.

choices.choice: Climb down and return to the path

forestDepths.description: Deeper into the forest, you come across an ancient shrine covered in ivy.

choices.choice: Ignore the shrine and move on

investigateShrine.description: The shrine reveals an old map showing hidden paths in the forest.

choices.choice: Use the map to find hidden treasures
Keep the map for later and explore more

hiddenTreasures.description: The map leads you to a hidden clearing with several small chests.

choices.choice: Mark the location and return later

hiddenPath.description: Following the clue, you find a hidden path leading to an ancient door covered in runes.

riverPath.description: Following the river, you reach a serene glade with an old bridge.

ancientDoor.description: The door creaks open, revealing a hidden chamber filled with treasures and the Lost Key.

examineRunes.description: The runes tell the story of the Lost Key and its power to unlock ancient mysteries.

choices.choice: Open the door with newfound knowledge

crossBridge.description: Crossing the bridge, you find yourself at the entrance to a hidden cave.

exploreGlade.description: Exploring the glade, you find a hidden passage leading deeper into the forest.

treasureRoom.description: You find a treasure chest glowing with a faint magical light.

choices.choice: Use the Lost Key to open the chest
Look for traps before opening the chest

treasureChestOpen.description: Inside the chest is a magical artifact. As you touch it, you feel a rush of energy. You've unlocked the Treasure of the Forest.

searchForTraps.description: You carefully inspect the chest and find that itâ€™s safe to open. You unlock the chest and discover a magical artifact.

caveExit.description: You quickly make your way out of the cave, but you can't shake the feeling that the adventure is far from over.
